events.description: The BDA is organizing a tour of Nantes for anyone interested in discovering the city where you'll be spending the next 3 years.

events.name: BDE BARBECUE
events.description: Don't miss the first evening at IMT Atlantique! The BDE is offering a free barbecue where you can meet people for the first time.
